name: Tonker Style Release
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
The triggering target of the *Tonker Style Release* will instantly be released. The target is no longer considered Connected by the Bala Plokami. If the target took damage directly because of this ability, this ability gains the Attack trait for this use only. If the target was the only target considered Connected by Bala Plokami, Bala Plokami loses the Connected trait.
